.. _alpha_ImageProfile:

**alpha_ImageProfile** (ImageEM & ImageQLSI classes method) |subTitle| Return the polarisability, optical volume and dry mass of small objects. |/subTitle|

.. include:: /classes/ImageMethods/methods/alpha_ImageProfile.rst
